name: COEP Technological University Pune
description: COEP Technological University, formerly known as College of Engineering Pune, is one of the oldest engineering institutions in India. It has a rich legacy of academic excellence and innovation.
highlights: Third Oldest Engineering College in India

name: Pune Institute of Computer Technology (PICT) Pune
address: Survey No. 27, Near Trimurti Chowk, Bharati Vidhyapith Campus, Dhankawadi, Pune, Maharashtra 411043
description: PICT Pune is renowned for its focus on computer science and related fields. It offers quality education in engineering and has a strong placement record, especially in the IT sector.

name: Walchand College of Engineering (WCE) Sangli
address: Walchand Hirachand Marg, Government Colony, Vishrambag, Sangli, Maharashtra 416415
description: WCE Sangli is a government-aided autonomous institute affiliated with Shivaji University. It has a long-standing reputation for excellence in engineering education and research.

name: Cummins College of Engineering for Women Pune
address: Cummins College Rd, Karve Nagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411052
description: Cummins College is the first all-women engineering college in India, established with the support of Cummins Diesel (India) Foundation. It aims to empower women through quality technical education.

name: Vishwakarma Institute of Technology (VIT) Pune
address: Upper Indira Nagar, Bibwewadi, Pune, Maharashtra 411037
description: VIT Pune is a premier private engineering institute affiliated with Savitribai Phule Pune University. It offers a range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs and is known for its strong academic curriculum and industry-oriented training.

name: Pimpri Chinchwad College of Engineering (PCCOE) Pune
description: PCCOE is an autonomous institute affiliated with Savitribai Phule Pune University. It offers a variety of engineering programs and is known for its emphasis on research and innovation.

name: Dr. D. Y. Patil Institute of Technology (DYPIT) Pune
address: Sant Tukaram Nagar, Pimpri Colony, Pune, Maharashtra 411018
description: DYPIT is part of the Dr. D. Y. Patil Group and offers a range of engineering and management programs. The institute focuses on holistic development and industry readiness.
highlights: Part of D. Y. Patil Group
